content: knitted baby blanket in drops babymerino the piece is worked back and forth with lace pattern pattern bm-147-by yarn group a **size** width approx 50-67 cm length approx 70-77 cm **yarn** drops baby merino from garnstudio 200-300 g colour 38 olive **needles** drops circular needle size 3 5 mm length 60 cm **knitting gauge** 24 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm
